title: Ani*Kuri15
synopsis: 15 one-minute shorts created by various people from Japan's animation industry. The title of the collection, Ani*Kuri15, is abbreviated from the words "anime" and "creators".
staff: [['Wada, Jouji', ['Producer']], ['Matsuo, Ryouichirou', ['Producer']], ['Kon, Satoshi', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Color Design']], ['Kobayashi, Osamu', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Background Art', ' Original Creator', ' Key Animation', ' Character Design']]]
